metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14017 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The r_bin_java_annotation_new function in shlr/java/class.c in radare22.7.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-basedbuffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted .class file becauseof missing input validation in r_bin_java_line_number_table_attr_new.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
